comment.author: 39191857@N05
comment._content: There was a lot of meat eaten in those days and thats for sure.  What a display of corpses, almost ghoulish!!!  Imagine how the EC bureaucrats and the health inspectorate would react to a display like that today??

comment.author: 47290943@N03
comment._content: They would have absolute caniptions! However, at least this array of meat was outside in December, not in high summer...
comment.authorname: National Library of Ireland on The Commons

great series of photos.

comment.author: 38823960@N02
comment._content: I think that I would rather have some of this meat than what we are forced to accept today with all its foreign ingredients.. At least it wasn't weighted with 0 DNA which seems to be a norm for fiddling us out of more money than its worth..
